Class ImvConnectionAdapterFactoryIetf

  • java.lang.Object

    ImvConnectionAdapterFactory

    public class ImvConnectionAdapterFactoryIetf
extends Object
implements ImvConnectionAdapterFactory
    The factory creates an IMV connection adapter according to IETF/TCG specifications.
